sentence.Network_en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentence.Network_en: She'd half expected him to withdraw from the course.
sentence.Network_cn: 她多少已经预料到他会中途就退出这门课程。

sentence.Network_en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
sentence.Network_cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

RelatedPhrase.word: She spends half her money on clothes

list.key: She spends half her money on clothes
list.exp: 她把一半钱花在衣服上
list.abs: (1)spend可用于“spend time/money+on+名词”或“spend time/money+(in)+动词-ing短语”。 She spends half her money on clothes.她把一半钱花在衣服上。.
